author: Widdi
title: What's that exactly
review: This is a very small and extremely unrealistic micro Technic set. it has a working propellor and of course spinning wheels. But why a prop? This makes it very unrealistic and it's crappy to other Promo Micros of that period.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Technic - Buggy Review
review:
This is a very small LEGO Technc set and it's simple as well. It doesn't have any minifigs but it's a good little vehichle to play with. The only play feature of this set is that the propellor on the back does sviwel full 360Â° when you maneuver this vehicle. It's a nice and easy build. It also won't take you as long as the bigger LEGO Technic sets. If you want to start building LEGO Technic sets I would recommend you to get these before you buy the bigger ones.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
